title: Client not letting me purchase RP
body: When I go to purchase RP I get this message instead. Failed to load URL "https://plstore.euw1.lol.riotgames.com/session/new/" with error "ERR_CONNECTION_TIMED_OUT" (-118).

replies.body: Some regions were having errors while trying to purchase RP with CC.  Everything should be okay now, though!
Ahh I see i'm not the only one. {{item:3151}}

oh well looks like they don't
 want ma moneyz
